resources.string: Q. If you weighed 45 kgs on Earth, how much would you weigh on the Moon?\n A. 45 kgs B. 7Â½ kgs C. 15 kgs D.None
Q. Which is the largest crater on the Moon?\n A. The crater Bailly B. The crater Carrington\n
Q. Who was the last person to walk on the Moon?\n A. Yuri Gagarin B. Neil Armstrong\n C. Eugene Cernan D.None
Q. How many times heavier is the Earth than the Moon?\n A. 61 times B.50 times\n C.10 times D.81 times
Q. If you can jump 3 feet high on the Earth, how high could you jump on the Moon?\n A. Just over 18 feet B.Just over 10 feet\n C. 3 feet D. Just over Half(1/2) feet
The Moon is Earth\'s only natural satellite.
